data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":null,"id":148413,"title":"An Essay on Victory Day","original_title":"Сочинение ко дню победы","overview":"On the eve of the Victory Day celebrations, three old wartime friends reunite in Moscow. But they don’t get a chance to sit and recall their long-forgotten exploits. Chairman of the Veterans Foundation Kilovatov (O. Yefremov) is accused of dealings with the criminal world and put behind the bars. Former dissident Morgulis (V. Tikhonov), now residing abroad, and participant of protest rallies Dyakov (M. Ulyanov) organize the release of their friend from prison. Confronted with the cruelty of their enemies who masterminded the arrest of their wartime buddy, our heroes involve mafia and security service in the release operation, and then decide to hijack a plane.","poster_path":"/z94Yp8M8b54eCNeaZNvA1GJkmf.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":6.993,"release_date":"1999-01-21","video":false,"vote_average":5.0,"vote_count":4},{"backdrop_path":"/jVsbzy5gj3McD8V6dDr7EMrLSqT.jpg","id":1040330,"title":"Black Adam: Saviour or Destroyer?","original_title":"Black Adam: Saviour or Destroyer?","overview":"Ahead of the release of upcoming fantasy film ‘Black Adam’, sit down with Dwayne Johnson as he discusses his starring role as the eponymous superhero.","poster_path":"/sTuXDWacwdcMS7NNLaynkfVBZkr.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":20.742,"release_date":"2022-10-15","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":409},{"backdrop_path":"/nb3xI8XI3w4pMVZ38VijbsyBqP4.jpg","id":872585,"title":"Oppenheimer","original_title":"Oppenheimer","overview":"The story of J.
